eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Clark, NV; AT 10:51 AM ON SEP 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:51 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: City of Henderson's Required Weekly Test (RWT). No action required. This is a test, there are no instructions at this time.
